site_tagline: Buy and sell Jura fully automatic coffee machines
home_welcome_text: Need a repair for your Jura coffee machine? Or looking for a used Jura fully automatic coffee machine at an affordable price? Then you've come to the right place.
home_welcome_text2: All machines have been carefully inspected, serviced and are waiting for a new home.
home_welcome_text3: Call us or visit us — whether in Mannheim or Helmstadt!
home_visit_title: We look forward to your visit!
products_subtitle: Machines for sale in Helmstadt and Mannheim
products_warranty: All our Jura machines come with 12 months warranty!
products_availability: Please note that not all models are in stock. We recommend calling ahead to confirm availability.
products_transfer: By arrangement, we'll bring your desired machine from Helmstadt to Mannheim or vice versa — free of charge.
premium_subtitle: Selected machines in top condition — Our highest quality tier
premium_description: Our premium machines are carefully selected Jura fully automatic coffee machines in particularly well-maintained optical and technical condition.
repair_subtitle: Is your machine showing errors or not making coffee? No problem — bring it to us!
repair_only_jura: We only repair Jura machines! NO SHIPPING!
service_small_desc: Brew unit removed, disassembled, cleaned and reassembled. Set of seals replaced. Manual descaling. Final test.
service_large_desc: Brew unit removed, disassembled, cleaned and reassembled. Outlet cleaned. Set of seals replaced. Flow meter cleaned. Grinder cleaned. Manual descaling. Final test. Hose replacement. Crema valve and outlet valve replaced.
buyback_subtitle: Do you have a Jura coffee machine for sale?
buyback_text: Simply tell us what you have and your asking price. We'll get in touch with you!
buyback_whatsapp: Or simply send us a photo via WhatsApp.
first_aid_subtitle: Having a problem with your Jura? Get first aid here!
first_aid_youtube: Find helpful videos on our YouTube channel.
stores_subtitle: We look forward to seeing you in person!
about_text: Kaffeetom has been active in Mannheim since January 2006. We specialize in buying, selling, repairing and servicing Jura fully automatic coffee machines.
order_success_text: Thank you for your order. Your order number is:
booking_received: Your appointment request has been sent!
booking_pending_info: We will review your request and get back to you shortly.
seo_title: KAFFEETOM — Buy & Repair Used Jura Coffee Machines
seo_description: Used Jura fully automatic coffee machines with 12 months warranty. Sales, repair & maintenance in Helmstadt and Mannheim. Since 2006.
seo_og_description: Buy, sell and repair used Jura fully automatic coffee machines. Two locations: Helmstadt & Mannheim.
seo_twitter_description: Buy & repair used Jura coffee machines — KAFFEETOM in Helmstadt and Mannheim.
cookie_text: We use cookies to improve our website and collect anonymous usage statistics.
cookie_necessary_desc: These cookies are required for the basic functions of the website.
cookie_analytics_desc: Help us understand how the website is used and improve it.
